content: the autumn is finally here and nothing is cozier around your neck than a cowl or bright colorful and cheery scarf now is the perfect time to make some warm and cozy crochet accessories and garments for yourself and for your loved ones here s a very pretty and simple crochet scarf pattern that will keep you warm and cozy during those cooler months today am sharing the pattern for this easy crochet autumn scarf the pattern is made by repeating only 2 rounds untill you reach the size needed this cozy autumn scarf is the perfect beginner friendly crochet project the color of the scarf says perfect for fall season and weather but you can very well use any color of your choice and make them match any holiday season this would also make a wonderful stash busting crochet project materials used - cake yarn 4 mm crochet hook size - 7/ 45 inches - can be customized to any size checkout the video tutorial here https //youtu be/evj33rm_xgc
